item.title: EyeBench: A Call for More Rigorous Evaluation of Retinal Image Denoising
item.description: Wenhui Zhu, Xuanzhao Dong, Xin Li, Yujian Xiong, Xiwen Chen, Peijie Qiu, Vamsi Krishna Vasa, Zhangsihao Yang, Yalin Wang. Under review at CVPR 2025
